thread.title: Friday Fun: Making Good on a Promise About Trump and the Supreme Court
thread.title_full: Friday Fun: Making Good on a Promise About Trump and the Supreme Court

author: Guy Benson
title: Friday Fun: Making Good on a Promise About Trump and the Supreme Court
text:
Share Tweet 
On Greg Gutfeld's 'year in review' show in late December, I made an on-air promise . Skip ahead to the one minute mark for a refresher: It's not a secret that I'm a bit tough on Trump, and have been for awhile. But if you're watching [Mr. President-elect], one of your first acts as president is going to be picking a Supreme Court justice. If you pick a young constitutionalist, I will wear a red baseball cap for a day, how about that? 
And lo, it came to pass. I've made my thoughts on the president's SCOTUS selection crystal clear -- in short, I'm elated. So because Trump held up his end of the bargain, I was happy to fulfill my pledge yesterday on Outnumbered OT. Within minutes, Fox News blasted out the video on Twitter and its official YouTube page. Enjoy, Team 'Make America Great Again.' A promise is a promise:
